mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS "id", p.name AS "guid", p.hname AS "name", p.description AS "description", p.type AS "type", p.published AS "published", p.template AS "template" FROM ASMS AS p WHERE p.nav_parent_id = #{nav_parent_id} AND p.type LIKE 'page%' ORDER BY p.hname ASC

SELECT p.id AS "id", p.name AS "guid", p.hname AS "name", p.description AS "description", p.type AS "type", p.published AS "published", p.template AS "template" FROM ASMS AS p WHERE p.nav_parent_id IS NULL AND p.type LIKE 'page%' ORDER BY p.hname ASC
SELECT nav_parent_id FROM ASMS WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO ASMS (name, hname, type, nav_parent_id, nav_cached_path, options, mdate, muser, owner, description) KEY (name) VALUES (#{guid}, #{name}, #{type}, #{nav_parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nav_cached_path}, #{options,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{user}, #{user}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS "id", p.hname AS "name", p.name AS "guid", p.type AS "type", p.mdate AS "mdate", p.muser AS "muser", p.owner AS "owner", p.published AS "published", p.template AS "template", p.options AS "options" FROM ASMS AS p WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.type LIKE 'page%'
SELECT p.template FROM ASMS AS p WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE asm_attrs SET options = #{options}, value = #{value}, large_value = #{largeValue}, mdate = now() WHERE asm_id = #{asmId} AND name = #{name}

MERGE INTO asm_attrs (asm_id, name, label, type, options, required, value, large_value, mdate) KEY (asm_id, name) VALUES (#{asmId}, #{name}, #{label}, #{type}, #{options}, #{required}, #{value}, #{largeValue}, now())
